name: Merge Art Puzzle
description:
Meet Merge Art Puzzle, a brand new stress-relieving game by Phat Fingers. It's a unique place where merging meets artistic puzzles! Relax and engage your mind with colourful stories coming to life.
In Merge Art Puzzle, you build images by merging materials to create puzzle pieces and build a colorful animated painting. It's a completely new way of experiencing a classic jigsaw game. Every puzzle is a unique and multilayered piece of art and has been specially created for Merge Art Puzzle.
